name: RPG Maker VX Ace - JSM Futuristic Music Pack
detailed_description:
Whether you are looking to fight your way through an alien attack or your characters are lost in battle you'll find the tune you need.

While avoiding the robot march or taking in the ambiance from a futuristic laboratory these tracks will help you along your way!

This music pack contains:
  • 13 looping OGG and WAV themes
  • 3 ambient background sounds
  • 4 music event tracks
  • 7 sci-fi sound effects
  • Bonus: MP3 files to help get those creative juices going!
